simulation.brain
Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
  simulation.brain.Scheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
iDataStreamSIM
public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements iDataStreamSIM

The actual implementation of per-tuple scheduling for the adaptive model. It is an Eddy implementation with SteMs.

Version:
1.0
Author:
kostas

findPosOfStreamInTheDerivesFromList

public int findPosOfStreamInTheDerivesFromList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list,
                                               java.lang.String str)
In the case the tuple has already been to an index of the current stream, find the stream in the list of the SteMs it has already been to.

Parameters:
list - the list of the SteMs the tuple has already been to.
str - the stream name we search for.
Returns:
The position in the list.

                                       java.lang.String attributename)
Find the index position of the attribute that the join is performed on.

Parameters:
streamname - the stream of the current SteM.
attributename - the attribute of the current SteM.
Returns:
The attribute position in the stream.

findAttributePosInTheCurrentTuple

public int findAttributePosInTheCurrentTuple(int pos,
                                             int res)
Find the index position of a given attribute, when the tuple derives from two other tuples, ie. has already been in a join.

Parameters:
pos - the index position of the stream in the derivesFrom list
res - the index position of the attribute in the stream it belongs to.
Returns:
The index position of the attribute in the tuple.

findAttributePosInJoinedTuple

public int findAttributePosInJoinedTuple(SteM stem)
Find the attribute index position in the current tuple, for the join to be performed with the given SteM.

Parameters:
stem - the current SteM
Returns:
The index position of the composite tuple that should be checked for join.
-1 if we drop the tuple

-2 for Cartesian Product

-3 if no join is required.

posInCurrentTuple

public int posInCurrentTuple(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> derivesFromList,
                             java.lang.String streamname,
                             SteM stem)
Find the attribute position in the current tuple.

Parameters:
derivesFromList - the list of the streams that composite the current tuple
streamname - the stream from those that composite the tuple.
stem - the current SteM
Returns:
The position of the attribute.

findInStemsBeenList

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findInStemsBeenList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> stemsBeenTo,
                                                                 SteM stem,
                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> curStreams)
Find from a list of stream names the names of the Streams of the SteMs, this tuple has been to.

Parameters:
stemsBeenTo - the list of the SteMs, this tuple has been through.
stem - the current SteM.
curStreams - a list of streams from the join conditions
Returns:
The list of the common names of the lists.

findFromJoinListStreams

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findFromJoinListStreams(java.lang.String stemStream,
                                                                     java.lang.String stemAttribute)
Find from the execution plan the streams that are joined, with the info from the given current SteM. It also checks if the result streams composite the current tuple.

Parameters:
stemStream - the stream name of the current SteM.
stemAttribute - the attribute name of the current SteM.
Returns:
The list of the streams.

probeTupleIntoSteMs

public boolean probeTupleIntoSteMs()
The implementation of probing a tuple into a SteM. Find all the matches in the SteM, and route each one of them into the Eddy.

Returns:
true if match is found, false otherwise.

public boolean toPredicate(int pos)
                    throws RoutingToPredicateException
Route the tuple to a non-join predicate.

Parameters:
pos - the position of the non-join predicate in the list that contains all the predicates.
Returns:
The result of the evaluation of the select operator. true if the predicate holds, false otherwise.

RoutingToPredicateException

Route tuple to a SteM.

Parameters:
pos - the position of the SteM in the list that contains all the SteMs.
Returns:
